mozhi.db¶

mozhi.db.conll_upload.delete_table(table_name, engine)[source]¶
Parameters:

  • table_name –

  • engine –

Returns:

mozhi.db.conll_upload.main(host: str, port: str, db_name: str, user: str, password: str, dir_root: str, is_delete: str, is_conll: str, experiment_name: str)[source]¶

Uploads csv/parquet files to DB for annotation.

Table data is expected to have following schema:

text: string features: string (optional) Space separated tokenized text labels: string (optional) Space separated corresponding tags

Tag data is expected to have following schema:

name: string Name of the tag

File name is used as table names. Recommended file name format:

{file_name}.csv and {file_name}_tags.csv

Args:

host: port: db_name: user: password: dir_root: is_delete: bool Delete existing table data is_conll: experiment_name:

Returns:

mozhi.db.conll_upload.parse_conll(txt_file_path)[source]¶

Parses and converts the vanilla CoNLL 2003 dataset into Dataframe Args:

txt_file_path:

Returns: pandas.DataFrame with columns [text, features, labels]
